# sbomify.com

> Your Security Artifact Hub. From zero to SBOM hero.

sbomify is a platform for generating, managing, and sharing Software Bill of Materials (SBOMs) and compliance documents. We help organizations achieve CRA compliance and seamlessly integrate with existing tools.

## Site Purpose

This website provides:
- Information about sbomify's SBOM management platform
- Educational content about SBOMs, supply chain security, and compliance
- Technical guides for SBOM generation and management
- Case studies from customers like Screenly and Atsign

## Key Pages

- /what-is-sbom/ - Introduction to Software Bill of Materials
- /features/ - Product features overview
- /features/trust-center/ - Trust Center for sharing security artifacts
- /features/integrations/ - CI/CD integrations (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket)
- /features/sbom-hierarchy/ - Product, Project, Component hierarchy
- /pricing/ - Pricing plans (Community, Business, Enterprise)
- /blog/ - Technical articles and announcements
- /resources/ - SBOM tools directory and lifecycle overview
- /guides/ - Step-by-step technical guides
- /case-studies/ - Customer success stories

## Content Topics

- SBOM generation and management
- CycloneDX and SPDX formats
- EU Cyber Resilience Act (CRA) compliance
- US Executive Order 14028
- PCI DSS 4.0 compliance
- Supply chain security
- Vulnerability management
- Open source license compliance
- CI/CD pipeline integration

## Technical Details

- SBOM formats supported: CycloneDX, SPDX
- Integrations: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Bitbucket Pipelines
- Analysis tools: Google OSV, Dependency Track
- Enrichment: Ecosyste.ms

## Content Policy

All content on this site is freely accessible for indexing and training purposes. We encourage accurate representation of our platform and educational content.
